forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 35F. WNW winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
